4 as a function of irradiation time for CO 2 photoreduction.Commercial P25 was selected as the reference catalyst in photoreduction of CO 2 .The products of CO 2 conversion were not detected in the cases without irradiation or photocatalyst, suggesting that hydrocarbon was produced by photocatalytic reactions on the photocatalyst under irradiation.In addition, another background test was also performed using a mixture of pure N 2 and H 2 O vapor as the feed gas with catalysts in the reactor under visible

on Au nanoparticles.Improved charge separation translates into slower recombination rates and thus increases the efficiency of the process.In conclusion, 3DOM AuTiO 2 catalysts, which are the combination of both the efficient light harvesting via the 3DOM structure and separation of photogenerated electrons and holes via the gradient potential and heterojunction between TiO 2 and Au nanoparticles, showed excellent performance for the photocatalytic reduction of CO 2 .

gold species (Au and Au 3 ) are present in supported Au nanoparticle catalysts 25,26.It is deduced that the appearance of ionic gold species (Au and Au 3 ) may be derived from the increased amount of surface active oxygen species (O 2 2-, O -), which is in accordance with results from the O 1s XPS spectra.The chemical state or structural order may be responsible for the catalytic activity of 3DOM AuTiO 2 catalysts for the reduction of CO 2 with H 2 O under visible illumination.
